sentence.Network_en: The official trades union council voted to disband itself and re-form as a confederation.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个官方的工会委员会投票决定解体然后重新组成联盟。

sentence.Network_en: In July he issued a decree ordering all unofficial armed groups in the country to disband.
sentence.Network_cn: 他于7月份下令解散国内所有的非正式武装组织。

sentence.Network_en: Judge Charles Schwartz is giving the state 60 days to disband and consolidate Louisiana's four higher education boards.
sentence.Network_cn: 查尔斯·施瓦茨法官将给路易斯安那州60天时间来解散然后合并该州的4个高等教育委员会。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... disavow 否认,不承认 disband 解散 discard 摒除,弃绝.
一些翻译~（转的~） ... detain 拘留，扣留 disband 解散，遣散 disperse 解散（集会等），驱散.
disband中文 ... 散货 bulk cargo... 散伙 disband 接触 contact / to contact.
拆这个字有几个音... ... [destroy by pulling down] 拆掉;拆散 [disband;dissolve a partnership,part company] 散摊子,散伙.

list.abs: 常用指令-基本资料-万王之王... ... party 队伍指令 party disband 队伍解散 party follow 解除跟随。 组队后记得解除跟随.

the generation of corporate deadlock is closely related the three doctrines of capital , and two legal systems consider judicial disbandment as the final measure of corporate deadlock .公司僵局的产生与资本三原则关系密切，二大法系都将司法解散作为应对公司僵局的最终措施。
they disbanded an army the close of the war .战争结束时他们遣散了军队。
as for the condom scattered in disband dinner , I think it's a positive behavior but wrong occasion .至于在散伙饭上散播避孕套，我认为是积极的行为，错误的场合。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from obsolete French desbander

entry.def: If someone disbands a group of people, or if the group disbands, it stops operating as a single unit.

example.ex: All the armed groups will be disbanded...
example.tran: 所有的武装团体都将被解散。

example.ex: The rebels were to have fully disbanded by June the tenth.
example.tran: 叛乱分子会在 6 月 10日前全部解散。

means.word_mean: 1. cause to break up or function;

sentences.sentence: "the principal disbanded the political student organization"

means.word_mean: 2. stop functioning or cohering as a unit;

sentences.sentence: "The political wing of the party dissolved after much internal fighting"

auth_sentence.content: One CLC member called on them to disband in a peaceful manner.
auth_sentence.res_content: One CLC member called on them to disband in a peaceful manner.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One CLC member called on them to disband in a peaceful manner.

auth_sentence.content: Burma's military forced the NLD to disband after it announced a boycott.
auth_sentence.res_content: Burma's military forced the NLD to disband after it announced a boycott.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Burma's military forced the NLD to disband after it announced a boycott.

auth_sentence.content: Any party which does not register with the election commission will have to disband.
auth_sentence.res_content: Any party which does not register with the election commission will have to disband.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Any party which does not register with the election commission will have to disband.

sentences.en: The emperor was deposed and his army disbanded.
sentences.cn: 皇帝被废黜，他的军队也被解散了。
